newsitem.title: USA: Novell executive Steve Markman leaves.
newsitem.headline: Novell executive Steve Markman leaves.

text.p: Novell Inc said Thursday that Steve Markman, executive vice president and general manager of Novell products Group, has resigned to become president and CEO of General Magic Inc.
Markman joined Novell in 1994, the company said.
Novell also said that it is changing its leadership to create "a cross-functional management team."

Under the system the executive vice president of corporate services, the chief technology officer, the chief financial officer and the senior vice presidents for legal, human resources, marketing, sales and engineering management will report to Novell President Joe Marengi.
The company said the structure will remove layers of management and allow it to act faster.
Novell provides network, Internet and intranet software.
